info.title: US Phone Number Lookup
info.description:
Insert an US phone number ( Digits only, 0 - 9 ) and retrieve details like approximate latitude and longitude, city, county and some other details about it.

Update: Added OpenCNAM API. ( www.opencnam.com )

parameters.name: opencnam-auth-token
parameters.description: Auth token, if you're using OpenCNAM Caller ID ( www.opencnam.com ).

parameters.name: opencnam-sid
parameters.description: Account SID, if you're using OpenCNAM Caller ID ( www.opencnam.com ).

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The complete phone number to lookup. Must contain only digits ( 0 - 9 ).
